thread.title: Kanye West astounds `American Idol` judges with fake audition
thread.title_full: Kanye West astounds `American Idol` judges with fake audition

author: NewsWire
title: Kanye West astounds `American Idol` judges with fake audition
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Melbourne, Oct.12 (ANI): The judges and contestants of ‘American Idol’ were left astounded when Kanye West capped off his Saturday with a surprise audition. 
The 38-year-old rapper enthralled the judges Jennifer Lopez, Harry Connick, Jr., and Keith Urban by performing an a cappella version of Gold Digger, News.com au reports. 
The ‘Stronger’ hit-maker even grabbed the golden ticket to compete in the next round in Hollywood. 
In addition to this, West also performed his 2005 hit single ‘Gold Diggar’.(ANI) Related Posts
